title: Facebook Messenger is now available for the Apple Watch, though you won’t be able be using any text
text:
Facebook Messenger is now available for the Apple Watch, though you won’t be able be using any text 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
Facebook Messenger is now available for the Apple Watch, though you won’t be able be using any text — you can simply send and receive vo...
